snippet: GOLDSTEIN--Lolita. American Friends of The Hebrew University and The Hebrew University of Jerusalem are saddened by the passing of Lolita Goldstein. Lolita, along with her beloved husband Melvin (z"l), established scholarships at Hebrew University. We extend our deepest sympathies to the entire family. May they be comforted among the mourners of Zion and Jerusalem. The Hebrew University of Jerusalem, Menahem Ben-Sasson, President; American Friends of The Hebrew University, Michael S. Kurtz, Chairman; Daniel I. Schlessinger, President; Beth Asnien McCoy, National Executive Director 1/3
